name: ClassPlay
description: A privacy-first, offline-ready classroom gamification suite for teachers.

gameDescriptions.ROULETTE: Fair random picker and no-repeat logic.
gameDescriptions.DRAFT: Controlled or random team assignment with click-to-assign draft style.
gameDescriptions.PASS_TOKEN: Turn-based participation where a digital token moves between students.
gameDescriptions.PRESENTATION: Structured group presentation timer with stages (Setup, Speech, Q&A).
gameDescriptions.TOPIC_REVEAL: Mystery Box style board. Assign topics or rewards with click-to-reveal cards.
gameDescriptions.TURN_ORDER: Randomize the sequence for presentations or line-ups.
gameDescriptions.DECISIONS: Dice, Coins, and Timers for instant classroom decisions.
gameDescriptions.ENERGY: Interactive visual gauge to measure or set the classroom energy level.
